desc:
Sea Harrier


The British Aerospace Sea Harrier is a naval short take-off and vertical landing/vertical take-off and landing jet fighter, reconnaissance and attack aircraft. It is the second member of the Harrier Jump Jet family developed.


First Flight: 1980

Engnie Type :Single Engine

Range :1000 KM

Weight :11900 Kg

Speed :1185 KM/hr

Scaled Size 100 : 0.2
